# 6. Extensions

There are several third party libraries that expand the functionality of Akka Http.

See the Scala Index for a list of them. [![Modules with the subject akka-http](https://index.scala-lang.org/count.svg?q=topics:akka-http&subject=akka-http&color=orange&style=flat-square&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://index.scala-lang.org/search?topics=akka-http)
